channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek #120 â€“ Fart Watch for Apple Watch Developer Interview

item.title: By: Charles McKeever
item.dc:creator: Charles McKeever
item.description: Thanks, Mo. Glad you liked the show. No, Fart Watch uses WatchKit. I suppose if someone wanted to use CoronaCards or Corona Enterprise to mix and match, they might be able to do something custom.
item.content:encoded: Thanks, Mo. Glad you liked the show. No, Fart Watch uses WatchKit. I suppose if someone wanted to use CoronaCards or Corona Enterprise to mix and match, they might be able to do something custom.

item.title: By: Mo
item.dc:creator: Mo
item.description:
Fantastic show! I wish I was there :) I too exicted about the Apple Watch. The only question I had was wether or the fart watch app was made with the Corona sdk?
Thank you Charles for bringing such cool and fun people!
Mo
